roleset.name: remove a sample of tissue for analysis/diagnosis

example.name: biopsy-v: Tissue as Arg1
example.text: In a patient with fibrocystic breast disease , you - NP1 ca n't just keep biopsying masses that appear every time they appear .
example.arg: masses that appear every time they appear.

example.name: biopsy-v: Patient as Arg1
example.text: Is it the standard of care *PRO* to biopsy all patients with fatty liver on ultrasound ?
example.arg: all patients with fatty liver on ultrasound?

example.name: biopsy-n: Arg1
example.text: The doctor ordered a fine - needle biopsy of the patient 's thyroid nodules .

example.name: biopsy-n
example.text: Biopsy consistent with invasive moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma .
example.amr: (c / consistent-01 :ARG1 (b / biopsy-101) :ARG2 (a / adenocarcinoma-01 :ARG1-of (d2 / differentiate-101 :ARG1-of (m / moderate-03)) :ARG0-of (i2 / invade-01)))
